pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena ārohanto nāma mahāmatto bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā santike bhattavissaggaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.5_0: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassa bhikkhuno bhuñjantassa pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvā accāvadati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.6_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apasādeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.9_0: “Pubbe maṁ tvaṁ evañca evañca karosi, idāni ettakaṁ na sahasī”ti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.10_0: pānīyathālakaṁ matthake āsumbhitvā vidhūpanena pahāraṁ adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.11_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.13_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṁ adāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.16_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṁ dassati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.18_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.19.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.1_0: Upasampanne upasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.2_0: Upasampanne vematikā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.3_0: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
